displayname.description: Funded Activities or Assured Eligible Expenditure

Or you have provided a sufficient level of assurance to demonstrate that the Grant will be used for Eligible Expenditure.

Description.description: Is Annex 10 Subsidy Control being used?
Is Annex 13 Recipient Subsidiary being used?
Is Annex 8 Data Protection being used?
Define the sections for the applicant's responses, separated by commas.
File upload to store the all the application questions to order the questions.
Where the funding period is less than 1 year, this section may be selected "Yes" to provide audit / assurance activity carried out over a shorter timescale.

Include the following: The bank account details listed in Your Confirmation of Bank Details form (and any alternative bank details nominated subsequently by You) must be an ordinary business bank account which is separate to any other accounts used by You to carry out Your business. All cheques from the bank account must be signed by at least two individual Representatives of Your business.
The Grant Recipient must provide the Authority with proof of costs/payments classified as Eligible Expenditure, which may include receipts, invoices, or other specified documents.
Which Annex includes terms relating to data protection
The amount a department has agreed to give the grant recipient
Name of the signatory person representing the department.

The words "England and Wales" can be replaced with either "Scotland" or "Northern Ireland" should the governing law of the grant agreement be that of Scotland or Northern Ireland
Timeframe for grant payment after authority approval (Default 30)
Binding or non-binding contract - should this be non-binding, Paragraph 31 of ANNEX 1 shall be deleted in its entirety and replaced with the words "Not Used"
Include this Major Asset Value if the department has decided to include the Major Asset definition in the grant offer letter. Leave empty if the definition has been left empty.

Where more detailed restrictions are required around the publicity-related activity that the Grant Recipient may undertake, the following section should be selected "Yes".
Name of signatory person representing the grant recipient
The interval, in months, between how long performance reports need to be submitted by the grant recipient

Name of the secretary of state for the department
The Grant is made pursuant to what section of the act
Name of the signatory for the front letter

Include the following: You acknowledge and accept that the Grant is awarded on the basis that in undertaking the Funded Activities you are not and will not be undertaking economic activities. A fundamental condition of the Grant is that the activities funded are, and that measures are (where necessary) taken, and maintained, to ensure that there is no cross-subsidy of any other economic activity you might pursue.

Include the following: The Grant is awarded to You as Minimal Financial Assistance in accordance with Section 36 of Subsidy Control Act 2022 which enables You to receive up to a maximum level of subsidy within the elapsed part of the current financial year and the two preceding financial years. The amount of the Grant is £[insert amount] and is subject to the conditions in Part 1 of Annex 5 and conditional on receipt by Us of the declaration form in that Annex. On receipt of the declaration form, We will provide you with confirmation of the assistance in a separate document.
Select "Yes" if the notice period for termination of the Grant Agreement for convenience is longer or shorter than 3 months.
How many working days the Termination for convenience notice period should be, if greater or less than 3 months.
Value of the Total Amount Of Grant in base currency.
